featured.text: To be qualified as “extra virgin,” the oil must also pass both an official test in a laboratory and a sensory evaluation by a trained tasting panel.
A redefinition of the term “olive oil” is also proposed to make a clear distinction between virgin olive oil and pure olive oil.
Which of the following statements is true about extra virgin olive oil?
Extra virgin oil, the finest grade, is made from the first pressing of the olives and has a very low acidity rate (under 1%).
Second on the ranking is virgin olive oil.

definition.zh_def: 未經過性行為的人，尤其是女性。
definition.en_def: A person who has not engaged in sexual intercourse, especially a female.
definition.example: She decided to wait until marriage to lose her virginity.
